GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v4.9.311
GSD.description:
gcc-plugins: latent_entropy: use /dev/urandom

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 942352131b4ed824fefddf87810faf2711a5e967, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 38addce8b600ca335dc86fa3d48c890f1c6fa1f4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
